title: Annual Summer Event
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>We’re going to use this formula here. Look, it should give you the value of x. Try it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>....Waah, I solved it! Thank goodness, and thank you, Nozomi-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, you solved it with your own power, Kotori-chan. All I did was give you a little hint. But I’m glad that I could be of help.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Thanks to you, I’ve finally completed the entirety of my summer homework~. I just wasn’t able to solve this one problem.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, by that, I guess you were able to do the rest of everything, huh? Good job for doing it all systematically~. I’ll pet you as a reward♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, geez, that tickles, Nozomi-chan~! But I can’t exactly say goodbye to all the homework just yet....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Hm? What do you mean?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>You see, Honoka-chan hasn’t progressed with her summer homework at all.... Umi-chan said she’ll keep an eye on Honoka-chan tomorrow to make sure she does them properly, so I’m also going to help.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Aah, Honoka-chan is the type to do everything on the last day, huh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, she’s been like this since grade school. It has become something like an annual summer event for us.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
